recommendations.recommendation: Show metric conversions alongside percentage deltas (e.g., “↓ 48% (11 days faster on average)”).
recommendations.rationale: Provides concrete delivery impact and supports procurement expectations for quantified benefits.
recommendations.accessibilityImpact: Improves comprehension for decision-makers comparing delivery timelines.

recommendations.recommendation: Increase top padding to 56px to separate CTA from ordered list when viewed on tablet breakpoints.
recommendations.rationale: Reduces cognitive load and prevents CTA from feeling visually merged with preceding list content.
recommendations.accessibilityImpact: Enhances focus order clarity for keyboard navigation.

recommendations.recommendation: Increase base line-height to 1.7 when rendering Japanese copy.
recommendations.rationale: Japanese scripts benefit from additional vertical rhythm to maintain readability at paragraph scale.
recommendations.accessibilityImpact: Supports WCAG 1.4.8 for readability in multi-script layouts.

recommendations.recommendation: Inject locale-aware font stack: "Noto Sans JP", "Hiragino Kaku Gothic ProN", system sans-serif.
recommendations.rationale: Ensures glyph coverage for kana/kanji and aligns with expectations for enterprise UI typography.
recommendations.accessibilityImpact: Prevents fallback to serif fonts that can hinder legibility.
